cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DL, cs.IR

Reasoning: The paper deals with emotion analysis in literature, which is a common topic in natural language processing (NLP) and computational linguistics (CL). The use of BERT for emotion classification also suggests a focus on NLP and machine learning (ML) techniques. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves the development of a novel approach to emotion analysis, which could fall under the categories of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and deep learning (cs.DL). Finally, the paper involves the annotation and analysis of a dataset, which could fall under the category of information retrieval (cs.IR).
